name: Stopless Hurdles
description:
You lose energy while running, hitting hurdle and dashing. Energy bolt is blue when you can dash and it's black when you have not enough energy or Dash Delay is not over. Collect bottle Power ups to regenerate energy. Your speed depends of your energy amount. When you are out of energy the game is over.

Credits: 

Programming HunT, Hackerman 

Graphics KnajFi, Rutek 

Game Design Baxing, ShadyImpostor

Team name: Na Spokojnie Team
